an4.264:4.1: “Mendicants, someone with four qualities is cast down to hell.
an4.264:4.3: They themselves kill living creatures; they encourage others to kill living creatures; and they approve of killing living creatures; and they praise killing living creatures.
an4.264:4.4: Someone with these four qualities is cast down to hell.
an4.264:5.1: Someone with four qualities is raised up to heaven.
an4.264:5.3: They don’t themselves kill living creatures; they encourage others to not kill living creatures; they approve of not killing living creatures; and they praise not killing living creatures.
an4.264:5.4: Someone with these four qualities is raised up to heaven.”
